topics.body:
In any case I still feel they are both equally matched in strength.

Asura took on planet sized assholes with ONE HAND. 

Plus Asura has that regenerating thing when he gets super pissed. 

Asura takes the term "THIS ISNT EVEN MY FINAL FORM" And takes it LITERAL. 

Even so with him taking damage He doesn't give up! My arm is gone? SO WHAT! LETS PUNCH SHIT! 

In any case I feel it would be a really fair fight.
